message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_FV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: A work queue name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_FV_DUPLICATE_QUEUE_NAME
message.locale: A work queue with this name exists already.

message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_FV_ADMIN_USER_EMPTY
message.locale: An administrator must be specified for the work queue.

message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_XRV_SUBSCRIPTIONS_STILL_EXIST
message.locale: You can not delete a work queue if there are users still subscribed to it.

message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_XRV_ORG_SUBSCRIPTIONS_STILL_EXIST
message.locale: You can not delete a work queue if there are organization objects still subscribed to it.
You can not delete a work queue if there are organisation objects still subscribed to it.

message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_XRV_TASKS_STILL_EXIST
message.locale: You can not delete a work queue if there are tasks still assigned to it.

message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_XRV_CASE_OWNER
message.locale: This work queue is the owner of one or more cases and therefore cannot be canceled.
This work queue is the owner of one or more cases and therefore cannot be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_XRV_WORK_QUEUE_ADMIN_IS_CLOSED
message.locale: A closed user cannot be added as administrator on a work queue.

message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_BOM_DOES_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: The work queue BOM instance with the identifier "%1n" does not exist.
message.cause: The specified work queue BOM instance does not exist on the system.
message.action: Ensure the work queue identifier is correct for the work queue BOM instance being processed.

message.name: INFO_ID_WORK_QUEUE_BUSINESS_OBJECT_INFORMATIONAL_NAME
message.cause: Used by the Work Queue Informational BOM when creating its constructor.
message.action: This is for informational purposes only.

message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_XFV_SPECIFY_SEARCH_CRITERIA
message.locale: You must specify some search criteria.

message.name: INF_WORK_QUEUE_NO_MATCH_FOUND
message.locale: No records matched the criteria specified.
